name: Lost Island (RUNLIKEHELLSTUDIOS)
description:
Description:

In this game the player plays as a sea captain lost on a dark uncharted island. The player has low visibility and must carefully navigate their surroundings. The dinosaurs in the game will only kill the player if the player touches their jaws. 

Controls:

W,S,A,D,  or arrows to move and space bar to jump.

The player can bounce on boxes to reach higher altitudes.

Platform:

Windows.

Development time: 

This project took 1 week to make.
